paragraphs.text:
%md
# About This Lab
**Lab:** Create Hive Production Database
**Objective:** Create a Hive production database, Cloudfin, using managed tables and ORC format
**File locations:** hostname:~/data/cloudfin
**Successful outcome:** Create Hive production database
**Before you begin:** This setup is dependent upon Cloudfin_hql having been run
**Related lessons:** Zeppelin

---

msg.data:
About This Lab

Lab: Create Hive Production Database
Objective: Create a Hive production database, Cloudfin, using managed tables and ORC format
File locations: hostname:~/data/cloudfin
Successful outcome: Create Hive production database
Before you begin: This setup is dependent upon Cloudfin_hql having been run
Related lessons: Zeppelin

paragraphs.text:
%md
# Setup

paragraphs.title: 1 - List tables for cloudfin

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

msg.data:
tab_name
claim_saving_stage
consent_data_stage
employee_stage
eu_country_stage
provider_summary_stage
us_customer_stage
ww_customer_stage

paragraphs.title: 2 - Create table claim_saving
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS cloudfin.claim_saving;

CREATE TABLE cloudfin.claim_saving(
  claim_date DATE,
  last_name STRING,
  client_id INT,
  claim_number INT,
  claim_code DECIMAL(7,7),
  claim_amount DECIMAL(7,2),
  risk_factor DECIMAL(7,7),
  claim_adjustment DECIMAL(7,2)
  )
STORED AS orc;

paragraphs.title: 3 - Insert into claim_saving using ITAS statement
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

INSERT INTO TABLE claim_saving SELECT * FROM claim_saving_stage;

paragraphs.title: 4 - Create table consent_data
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS consent_data;

CREATE TABLE consent_data(
  country_code STRING,
  country STRING,
  insurance_id INT,
  marketing_consent STRING,
  marketing_consent_start_date DATE,
  loyalty_consent STRING,
  loyalty_consent_start_date DATE,
  third_party_consent STRING,
  third_party_consent_start_date DATE
  )
STORED AS ORC;

paragraphs.title: 5 - Insert into consent_data using ITAS statement
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

INSERT INTO TABLE consent_data SELECT * FROM consent_data_stage;

paragraphs.title: 6 - Create table employee
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS employee;

CREATE TABLE employee(
  emp_id INT,
  name STRING,
  age INT,
  telephone STRING,
  email STRING,
  birthday DATE,
  country_code STRING,
  salary DECIMAL(7,2)
  )
STORED AS ORC;

paragraphs.title: 7 - Insert into employee using ITAS statement
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

INSERT INTO TABLE employee SELECT * FROM employee_stage;

paragraphs.title: 8 - Create table eu_country
9 - Insert into eu_country using ITAS statement
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

INSERT INTO TABLE eu_country SELECT * FROM eu_country_stage;

paragraphs.title: 10 - Create table provider_summary
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS provider_summary;

CREATE TABLE provider_summary(
    provider_id INT,
    company_name STRING,
    address STRING,
    city STRING,
    state_code STRING,
    zip_code STRING,
    regional_office STRING,
    business_years INT,
    claim_amount DECIMAL(7,2),
    paid_amount DECIMAL(7,2),
    adustment_amount DECIMAL(7,2)
    )
STORED AS ORC;

paragraphs.title: 11 - Insert into provider_summary using ITAS statement
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

INSERT INTO TABLE provider_summary SELECT * FROM provider_summary_stage;

paragraphs.title: 12 - Create table us_customer
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS us_customer;

CREATE TABLE us_customer(
    customer_id INT,
    gender STRING,
    title STRING,
    first_name STRING,
    middle_initial STRING,
    last_name STRING,
    address STRING,
    city STRING,
    state_code STRING,
    state STRING,
    zip_code STRING,
    country_code STRING,
    country STRING,
    email STRING,
    username STRING,
    password STRING,
    telephone STRING,
    telephone_country_code STRING,
    mother_maiden STRING,
    birthday DATE,
    age INT,
    tropical_zodiac STRING,
    cc_type STRING,
    cc_number STRING,
    cvv2 INT,
    cc_expires DATE,
    national_id STRING,
    mrn STRING,
    insurance_id INT,
    eye_color STRING,
    occupation STRING,
    company STRING,
    vehicle STRING,
    domain STRING,
    blood_type STRING,
    weight NUMERIC (6, 2),
    height NUMERIC (6, 2),
    latitude NUMERIC (12, 8),
    longitude NUMERIC (12, 8)
    )
STORED AS ORC;

paragraphs.title: 13 - Insert into us_customer using ITAS statement
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

INSERT INTO TABLE us_customer SELECT * FROM us_customer_stage;

paragraphs.title: 14 - Create table ww_customer
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ww_customer;

CREATE TABLE ww_customer(
    customr_id INT,
    title STRING,
    first_name STRING,
    middle_initial STRING,
    last_name STRING,
    name_set STRING,
    address STRING,
    city STRING,
    state_code STRING,
    state STRING,
    zip_code STRING,
    country_code STRING,
    country STRING,
    telephone_country_code STRING,
    telephone STRING,
    email STRING,
    username STRING,
    password STRING,
    national_id STRING,
    mrn STRING,
    insurance_id INT,
    cc_type STRING,
    cc_number STRING,
    cvv2 INT,
    cc_expires STRING,
    occupation STRING,
    company STRING,
    domain STRING,
    vehicle STRING,
    gender STRING,
    mothers_maiden STRING,
    birthday STRING,
    tropical_zodiac STRING,
    age INT,
    eye_color STRING,
    blood_type STRING,
    weight NUMERIC (6, 2),
    height NUMERIC (6, 2),
    latitude NUMERIC (12, 8),
    longitude NUMERIC (12, 8)
    )
STORED AS ORC;

paragraphs.title: 15 - Insert into us_customer using ITAS statement
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

INSERT INTO TABLE ww_customer SELECT * FROM ww_customer_stage;

paragraphs.title: 16 - Drop cloudfin staging tables
17 - Delete hdfs staging data
paragraphs.text:
%sh

hdfs dfs -rm -r -skipTrash /data/cloudfin

paragraphs.title: 18 - List cloudfin tables
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

SHOW TABLES;

paragraphs.title: 19 -  Confirm the tables have been loaded correctly
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive)

SELECT * FROM ww_customer LIMIT 5;

paragraphs.text:
%md

# Reset

paragraphs.title: 1 - Drop the database and all tables
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc

DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS cloudfin CASCADE;
%angular
